title: Maximum chance of victory!
subtitle: This is the best scenario
description: Whenever Far-left and far-right parties get low scores, right-wing parties get low enough scores and greens, centrists and center-left parties have a higher share of the vote, we have the strongest chances.

title: High chance of success
subtitle: Still a favorable scenario
description: When the far-right and right-wing parties gain a bit more votes, but the centrists and center-left parties still dominate, our chances are still high.

title: Good chance of winning
subtitle: A balanced scenario
description: If the votes are evenly distributed among all parties, we still have a good chance of winning.

title: Moderate chance of success
subtitle: A challenging scenario
description: When right-wing parties gain more votes, the situation becomes challenging, but we still have a moderate chance of success.

title: Average chance of victory
subtitle: A tough scenario
description: If the far-right parties gain significant votes, our chances of victory become average.

title: Below average chance of success
subtitle: A difficult scenario
description: When far-right and right-wing parties dominate the vote, our chances of success fall below average.

title: Low chance of victory
subtitle: A very difficult scenario
description: If the far-right parties significantly dominate the vote, our chances of victory are low.

title: Very low chance of success
subtitle: A nearly impossible scenario
description: When far-right parties overwhelmingly dominate the vote, our chances of success are very low.

title: Minimal chance of victory
subtitle: An almost hopeless scenario
description: If the far-right parties have an absolute majority, our chances of victory are minimal.

title: No chance of success
subtitle: A hopeless scenario
description: When far-right parties have all the votes, there is no chance of success.
